title: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Lassen Film Festival
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Special Events     Lassen Film Festival                Lassen Film Festival          Â    Lassen Film Festival July 16 & 17, 2016 Kohm Yah-mah-nee Visitor Center and Manzanita Lake area Join us for this free event celebrating Lassen Volcanic National Park and outdoor recreation through film. Enjoy daytime and evening film screenings at the Kohm Yah-mah-nee Visitor Center auditorium and amphitheater as well as the Loomis Museum auditorium and Manzanita Lake amphitheater. Themes for this year's festival include Find Your Park, Astronomy, Flora and Fauna, Recreation, Astrobiology, and Wilderness. All screenings will occur at both the Kohm Yah mah-nee Visitor Center and Loomis Museum. Evening screenings will be at the Kohm Yah-mah-nee Amphitheater and the Manzanita Lake Amphitheater. Please call the visitor center for more information at (530) 595-4480. 2016 Summer Film Festival Schedule (313 KB, PDF)
